column2: "I've seen a lot of how you fight now, senpai, so I think I'm starting to understand."
"No matter what you're facing, you never flinch. You draw on all your knowledge and experience and calmly take them down."

"And here I am, panicking at the first sign of trouble.
...You're amazing, you know that?"
"...So, if it's alright with you, I'd like you to take me on some of your missions."
"This is my Partner Card. I hope you'll take good care of me, senpai."
